content.rendered:
What is cellulite?
Learn the Basics About Cellulite
& How Avéli® Works

Cellulite is primarily caused by septa bands, which tether the skin and cause dimples. The Avéli® procedure releases the septa bands and reduces the appearance of dimples.

Many products claim and fail to remove cellulite on the thighs and buttocks. Learn how Avéli® is the FDA-cleared cellulite treatment that is one-time and long-lasting.

There are many products that claim to get rid of cellulite on the thighs and buttocks. But is cellulite reduction really possible? It can be if you understand what causes cellulite.

Cellulite Basics

Cellulite is a depression of any shape or size seen on the surface of the skin, typically on the buttocks or thighs, with a defined edge. A major underlying cause of cellulite are the fibrous bands that tether your skin to the structures below. These bands are called septa.3

About Those Dimples

Septa can be different for different women or in different parts of the body. Some septa are good (and you want them as connective tethers), but others stiffen or shrink over time and lead to the dimples we see on the surface and call cellulite.3

What Cellulite Isn’t

First of all, cellulite is not your fault – it’s not a result of something you did or didn’t do. Instead, it’s linked to genetics and hormones, so diet and exercise won’t always cure it all.

Second, cellulite is not laxity (a loss of elasticity in our skin). Nor is it poor skin quality. And last, loud and clear, cellulite is not fat.

What You Can Do About Cellulite

Instead of blindly treating cellulite from the outside-in, you can choose to treat the septa causing cellulite from the inside-out. With Avéli®, a provider can identify the septa leading to cellulite and precisely treat them under your skin in just a single, in-office procedure.3

See How Avéli® Works

Find an Avéli® Provider

(It’s Not Complicated)

Experience the Avéli® difference. Talk to a provider in your area.

Find a Provider
